Hi all,

I know, JUnit 'unit' tests should always pass ;-) But we are using=
 the 
JUnit framework to write integration and systemtests as well. So from=
 
time to time, in this area something may go wrong. Therefore I'm 
looking=
 for a tool, that generates a report showing only the 
differences between =
current and last JUnit report - which failing 
tests were fixed, which test=
s stopped to pass, which tests were added 
and which removed. Additionaly a=
 test trend analysis should be 
possible.

I know, parsing the XML junitrep=
ort output and generating the info, 
e.g., with the help of a database, wou=
ld be possible. But is anyone 
aware of an existing tool or open source pro=
ject that can help in this 
direction?

--Klaus
